details.songOfResponse: When I Survey the Wondrous Cross #144

list: Choir practice Sunday evening at 5:30 PM.
We are accepting donations for the Christmas Shoeboxes. The goal is to send 150.
September 7: Quarterly business meeting following the evening service.
September 27: Men’s Discipleship Group meeting at Mark Deaton’s at 8:00 AM.
September 21 & October 12: Services at Rawlings-Stinson park.
October 10-11: We are hosting the CRMA Retreat 'Unity, Salvation, Sanctification.'
